item.title: UAL
item.description: score:-28 Chances: Despite facing financial challenges, UAL has a plan to increase revenue through higher checked baggage fees. The recent incidents involving Boeing 737 MAX planes could lead to increased scrutiny and delays in aircraft certification. Risks: The recent incidents involving United Airlines-operated Boeing 737 MAX planes may impact the companyâ€™s reputation and passenger confidence.

item.title: DAL
item.description: score:2 Chances: Delta Air Lines is expected to benefit from increased checked baggage fees, which could bolster the company’s top line. The global airline industry is anticipated to experience growth, which may positively impact Delta Air Lines’ business. Risks: The delay in the deliveries of the Boeing 737 Max 10 aircraft could impact Delta Air Lines’ operations and capacity expansion.
